author: hchar
msg: 1) No need to check for num < 0 in getLargest(), for it would fail anyway had curSize is zero.
2) Throw IndexOutOfBoundException if invalid position passed to remove()

author: asmuts
msg: Added some simple unit tests.  Concurrent and simple removal tests.  Sorted Preferential Array tests.

author: asmuts
msg: Updated docs and site layout.  Added a downloads page and fixed a few typos.  I'm having some problems with the site gen.  The Downloads.html is getting generated with a lowercase d.  I had to manually change the name.  If I can't figure it out, I'll change the link in the navigation.xml to point to a lowercase d.
